channel.title: Comments on: Here are my SSIS 2012 Data Sources
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Axel Achten (axel8s)
item.dc:creator: Axel Achten (axel8s)
item.description: No I didn't but I was preparing the SSIS2008 MOC training, where they explicitly mention the sources and views, on a SQL 2012 install and was wondering if I could find them back...<br /> But indeed they are gone in 2012.
item.content:encoded:
No I didn’t but I was preparing the SSIS2008 MOC training, where they explicitly mention the sources and views, on a SQL 2012 install and was wondering if I could find them back…
But indeed they are gone in 2012.

item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: Data Source Views are gone in SSIS 2012. Did you ever ever use those? I surely didn't :)
item.content:encoded: Data Source Views are gone in SSIS 2012. Did you ever ever use those? I surely didn’t ðŸ™‚
